$chain_token$ 0x22C1f6050E56d2876009903609a2cC3fEf83B415 sourcetype="ethereum:nft" | eval nft_startDate=mvindex('metadata.attributes{}.value',0) | eval nft_endDate=mvindex('metadata.attributes{}.value',1) | eval nft_vEvent=mvindex('metadata.attributes{}.value',2) | eval nft_city=mvindex('metadata.attributes{}.value',3) | eval nft_country=mvindex('metadata.attributes{}.value',4) | eval nft_eventURL=mvindex('metadata.attributes{}.value',5) | eval txn_type=if(from="0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000","mint","transfer") | stats c(eval(txn_type="mint")) as mints c(eval(txn_type="transfer")) as transfers latest(index) as index values(nft*) as nft* by metadata.name metadata.description metadata.image_url | sort - mints | rename "metadata.name" AS name "metadata.description" as nft_description "metadata.image_url" as nft_image_url | table name index mints transfers nft_startDate nft_endDate nft_city nft_country nft_vEvent nft_description nft_image_url

$chain_token$ 0x22C1f6050E56d2876009903609a2cC3fEf83B415 sourcetype="ethereum:nft" | eval nft_startDate=mvindex('metadata.attributes{}.value',0) | eval nft_endDate=mvindex('metadata.attributes{}.value',1) | eval nft_virtualEvent=mvindex('metadata.attributes{}.value',2) | eval nft_city=mvindex('metadata.attributes{}.value',3) | eval nft_country=mvindex('metadata.attributes{}.value',4) | eval nft_eventURL=mvindex('metadata.attributes{}.value',5) | rename "metadata.name" AS name "metadata.description" as nft_description | search name="$nft_name$" | stats latest(metadata.home_url) as homeURL latest(nft_eventURL) as eventURL latest(tokenURI) as tokenURI latest(metadata.image_url) as imageURL| transpose | rename column as Attribute, "row 1" as URL

`ethereum_index` 0x22C1f6050E56d2876009903609a2cC3fEf83B415 sourcetype="ethereum:nft" | append [search index=federated:xdai 0x22C1f6050E56d2876009903609a2cC3fEf83B415 sourcetype="ethereum:nft"] | eval nft_startDate=mvindex('metadata.attributes{}.value',0) | eval nft_endDate=mvindex('metadata.attributes{}.value',1) | eval nft_virtualEvent=mvindex('metadata.attributes{}.value',2) | eval nft_city=mvindex('metadata.attributes{}.value',3) | eval nft_country=mvindex('metadata.attributes{}.value',4) | eval nft_eventURL=mvindex('metadata.attributes{}.value',5) | table _time metadata.name nft* from to metadata.description | eventstats count as total | stats dc(metadata.name) as unique_NFTs count by to total | eval perc=round(count/total*100,2) | sort - count | table to unique_NFTs count perc

index="federated:xdai" 0x22C1f6050E56d2876009903609a2cC3fEf83B415 sourcetype="ethereum:nft" | eval nft_startDate=mvindex('metadata.attributes{}.value',0) | eval nft_endDate=mvindex('metadata.attributes{}.value',1) | eval nft_virtualEvent=mvindex('metadata.attributes{}.value',2) | eval nft_city=mvindex('metadata.attributes{}.value',3) | eval nft_country=mvindex('metadata.attributes{}.value',4) | eval nft_eventURL=mvindex('metadata.attributes{}.value',5) | table _time metadata.name nft* from to metadata.description | eventstats count as total | stats dc(metadata.name) as unique_NFTs count by from total | eval perc=round(count/total*100,2) | sort - count | table from unique_NFTs count perc `fix_ifields_issue`

index="federated:xdai" 0x22C1f6050E56d2876009903609a2cC3fEf83B415 sourcetype="ethereum:nft" | eval nft_startDate=mvindex('metadata.attributes{}.value',0) | eval nft_endDate=mvindex('metadata.attributes{}.value',1) | eval nft_virtualEvent=mvindex('metadata.attributes{}.value',2) | eval nft_city=mvindex('metadata.attributes{}.value',3) | eval nft_country=mvindex('metadata.attributes{}.value',4) | eval nft_eventURL=mvindex('metadata.attributes{}.value',5) | table _time metadata.name nft* from to metadata.description | search nft_city>0 | stats dc(metadata.name) as unique_NFTs count by nft_city | sort - count `fix_ifields_issue`
